links.to_node: not say anything and potentially hurt our friendship
I continue to harbor unexpressed romantic feelings.
I experience emotional discomfort or distress due to unrequited feelings.
The friendship between me and the girl remains unchanged on the surface.
I may struggle with feelings of resentment or sadness over time.
The girl remains unaware of my true feelings, potentially leading to misunderstandings.
I might miss the opportunity to potentially deepen the relationship, despite the risk involved.
The dynamic of the friendship could become strained if my feelings intensify or become harder to hide.
